ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 18
ygData.msgSnippet: There you have it, even players say screw you, +PvP people.  You aren t worthy of a good game experience. ... From: Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson
ygData.messageBody:
There you have it, even players say "screw you, +PvP people. You aren't
worthy of a good game experience."
----- Original Message -----
From: Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson <ldyiggie@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 4:27 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 18


> From: "Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson" <ldyiggie@...>
>
> Actually I don't believe it was done to make PVP players harder but to
protect
> those who choose not to PVP. I can understand why you say these things
> make your lives harder tho. However, I have to say that I support Verant
on this
> one.. there are just too many jerks out there who give PVP a bad name with
> their antics.
>
> Iggie
>
> >> Date: Wed, 21 Apr 1999 12:01:49 -0700
> From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
> Subject: Re: Our class
>
> Verant has done a variety of thinks to make +PvP players' lives harder.
> Loot bug springs instantly to mind<<
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Has ONElist changed your life?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Visit our homepage and share with us your experiences at ONElist of the
Week!
>
